courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the basics of music theory including notes, scales, and chords.

courses.title: Intermediate Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Take your guitar skills to the next level with advanced techniques and exercises.

courses.description: Explore advanced techniques in music production including mixing and mastering.

courses.description: Unlock your creativity and learn how to write compelling songs.
